name: Imperialdramon_Fighter_Mode
description: Imperialdramon Fighter Mode is an Ancient Dragonkin Digimon. It is a form of Imperialdramon Dragon Mode that liberated all of its power, changing form into the legendary Fighter Mode ( 竜戦士 , Ryū Senshi ? , lit. "Dragon Warrior") . It is an ultimate Digimon that acquired a great intellect by changing from the difficult-to-control Dragon Mode to a human form. It is said that the power to destroy a planet dwells in its attacks. It wields the "Positron Laser", equipped to its right arm. Also, when it awakens to perfect justice, it is able to transform into an even further Mode.
